title: Walk to Breweries, Target, Safeway and Ferry! Receive 8 wks FREE!
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1365 Sq.
By ferry to San Francisco or by tube to Oakland, Admirals Cove puts you within 30 minutes of the area's major employment hubs.
An ideal location for daily commutes and a lifestyle with easy access to entertainment and dining close to home or across the bay.

In Every Unit, - Dedicated Parking, - Spacious Backyards, - Stainless Steel Appliances, - Open Living Space, - Generous Closets, - Luxury 2-Story Town-home Apartments, - Exterior Storage Closet or Barn Sheds*, - Fully Equipped Kitchens incl.
Dishwasher, - Porches with Direct Unit Access

- Adjacent to Brand New Community Ballfields, - OrangeTheory, - Michaels, - The Habit Burger Grill, - Target, - Safeway, - Access to Walking and Bike Trails, - Outdoor BBQs, - Tree-lined Streets, - Alameda's Landing – less than 1 mile away, Conveniently located for your everyday needs!,

Click on QR code picture for a virtual tour of our 3 bedroom townhomes!, - In N Out, - Pool and Hot Tub, - Community Green Space w/ Bocce Ball, - Resident Clubroom, - Fitness Center, - Resident Dog Park, - Chipotle
Pet Friendly, 2 pets max per household.
For Rent homes rentals Alameda ferry building easy commute back yard large yards
